subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Wade Davis pitched a six-hitter and John Jaso hit a three-run homer Friday night as the Tampa Bay Rays moved within five and a half games of Boston in the A.L. wild-card race.
snippet: Wade Davis pitched a six-hitter and John Jaso hit a three-run homer Friday night as the Tampa Bay Rays moved within five and a half games of Boston in the A.L. wild-card race.
